name: shiru
description: Wrap javascript functions in a type checker.
author: Walter Rafelsberger

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n shiru -o build/shiru.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs build/shiru.js -c -m -o build/shiru.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/shiru.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/shiru.js build/shiru.min.js
